==Trivia==
===Etymology===
* Dargo is possibly based on {{w|Dargo}} an Australian town in the State of {{w|Victoria (state)|Victoria}}, Dargo is of {{w|Aboriginal Australians|Aboriginal Australian}} origins coming from the {{w|Brabiralung}} people group which lives in the area.
